channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Hunting for QR Code AiTM Phishing and User Compromise
item.description:
In the dynamic landscape of adversary-in-the-middle (AiTM) attacks, the Microsoft Defender Experts team has recently observed a notable trend – QR code-themed phishing campaigns. The attackers employ deceptive QR codes to manipulate users into accessing fraudulent websites or downloading harmful content.
These attacks exploit the trust and curiosity of users who scan QR codes without verifying their source or content. Attackers can create QR codes that redirect users to phishing sites that mimic legitimate ones, such as banks, social media platforms, or online services. The targeted user sca...
